document.full_text: a key government witness in the barry bonds perjury trial testified wednesday that he saw the home run king's personal trainer leave bonds' bedroom at spring training with a syringe in 2000.
document.title: witness testifies he saw bonds with syringe
lines_and_colors: a key government witness in the barry bonds perjury trial testified wednesday that he saw the home run king's personal trainer leave bonds' bedroom at spring training with a syringe in 2000.
